Leading Strike.name: Leading Strike
Leading Strike.flavor: You show an ally how to hit your foe where it hurts.
Leading Strike.onHit:
1[W] + Wisdom modifier damage. One ally adjacent to you or to the target gains a bonus to his or her next damage roll against the target equal to your Intelligence modifier.
Level 21: 2[W] + Wisdom modifier damage.

Whirlwind Charge.name: Whirlwind Charge
Whirlwind Charge.flavor: As you charge your foe, divine light surrounds you in a protective nimbus, then erupts at your foe.
Whirlwind Charge.special: When charging, you can use this power in place of a melee basic attack. If you charge, you gain a +4 bonus to AC against opportunity attacks you provoke while moving to the target.

Radiant Vengeance.name: Radiant Vengeance
Radiant Vengeance.flavor: Calling on the power of your deity, you transfer the pain of your wounds to a foe and regain some resilience.
Radiant Vengeance.onHit:
1d8 + Wisdom modifier radiant damage, and you gain temporary hit points equal to your Wisdom modifier.
Level 21: 2d8 + Wisdom modifier damage.

Light of the Avenging Sun.name: Light of the Avenging Sun
Light of the Avenging Sun.flavor: As your attack hits home, your become wrapped in blinding light, hindering a foe’s ability to strike you.
Light of the Avenging Sun.onHit: 2[W] + Wisdom modifier radiant damage, and the target takes a -4 penalty to attack rolls against you until the end of your next turn.

Enmity's Reach.name: Enmity's Reach
Enmity's Reach.flavor: A crash of thunder behind your foe shoves it closer to your waiting weapon and slows that foe’s escape.
Enmity's Reach.onHit: 1d10 + Wisdom modifier thunder damage, and you pull the target 2 squares. The target is slowed until the end of your next turn.

Avenging Echo.name: Avenging Echo
Avenging Echo.flavor: Your weapon sweeps in a deadly arc, leaving in its wake swirling radiant energy that keeps your foes at bay.
Avenging Echo.onHit: 1[W] + Wisdom modifier damage. Until the end of your next turn, any enemy that ends its turn adjacent to you or that hits or misses you takes 5 radiant damage.
Avenging Echo.censureOfRetribution: The radiant damage equals 5 + your Intelligence modifier.

Avenger's Shield.name: Avenger's Shield
Avenger's Shield.flavor: You create a sphere of radiance that burns your foe. The sphere also protects you, flaring brightly if that foe attacks you.
Avenger's Shield.onHit: 4d6 + Wisdom modifier radiant damage. If the target hits or misses you before the end of your next turn, as an immediate reaction you cause the target to be blinded until the end of your next turn.

Sequestering Strike.name: Sequestering Strike
Sequestering Strike.flavor: Your attack slices into your foe and through the fabric of space, hurtling both you and that foe a short distance away.
Sequestering Strike.onHit: 2[W] + Wisdom modifier damage, and you teleport the target 2 squares. You then teleport to a space adjacent to the target.
Sequestering Strike.censureOfPursuit: The number of squares you teleport the target equals 1 + your Dexterity modifier.

Temple of Light.name: Temple of Light
Temple of Light.flavor: Your weapon strike creates a field of searing energy around an enemy. The energy burns any foe you hit that is within the field.
Temple of Light.effect: The attack creates a zone of radiant energy in a burst 2 centered on the target. The zone lasts until the end of the encounter. When the target moves, the zone moves with it, remaining centered on it. Whenever you hit a creature that is within the zone, that attack deals 1d6 extra radiant damage.

Renewing Strike.name: Renewing Strike
Renewing Strike.flavor: You draw on your deity’s power to smite your foe with divine lightning and to heal your injuries.
Renewing Strike.effect: You can spend a healing surge.

Executioner's Cloak.name: Executioner's Cloak
Executioner's Cloak.flavor: With a stroke of your weapon, you cause shadows to flow over your foe’s eyes, concealing you as you close in for the kill.
Executioner's Cloak.onHit: 2[W] + Wisdom modifier damage, and you are invisible to the target (save ends).
Executioner's Cloak.aftereffect: You are invisible to the target until the end of your next turn.
Executioner's Cloak.onMiss: Half damage, and you are invisible to the target until the end of your next turn.

Oath of Consuming Light.name: Oath of Consuming Light
Oath of Consuming Light.flavor: You place a burning mark of divine radiance on your foe as you swear an oath to destroy this creature. With every wound you inflict on the creature, the burning mark erupts in searing light.
Oath of Consuming Light.onHit: 2d10 + Wisdom modifier radiant damage. Whenever you hit the target with a divine power, the target takes 1d6 extra radiant damage (save ends).
Oath of Consuming Light.aftereffect: Whenever you hit the target with a divine power, the target takes 1d4 extra radiant damage (save ends).
Oath of Consuming Light.onMiss: Half damage. Whenever you hit the target with a divine power, the target takes 1d4 extra radiant damage (save ends).

Resonant Escape.name: Resonant Escape
Resonant Escape.flavor: A quick prayer as you dodge calls forth divine power, which carries you a short distance away.
Resonant Escape.trigger: An enemy hits or misses you with a melee attack

Oath of Enduring Wrath.name: Oath of Enduring Wrath
Oath of Enduring Wrath.flavor: You swear to defeat your enemies, and your god grants you the perseverance to overcome any hindrance.
Oath of Enduring Wrath.effect: You gain a +2 power bonus to saving throws until the end of the encounter.

River of Life.name: River of Life
River of Life.flavor: Divine power flows through you, allowing you to shrug off injury after injury.
River of Life.effect: You gain regeneration 5 until the end of the encounter.

Inexorable Pursuit.name: Inexorable Pursuit
Inexorable Pursuit.flavor: Shrouded in divine mist, you stride through any obstacle to reach your foe, then smite it with the wrath of your god.
Inexorable Pursuit.effect: Before the attack, you gain phasing until the end of your turn, and you shift 3 squares.
Inexorable Pursuit.censureOfPursuit: The number of squares you shift equals 2 + your Dexterity modifier.

Oath of Enmity.name: Oath of Enmity
Oath of Enmity.flavor: You focus your wrath on a single foe, giving your attacks against it extraordinary accuracy.
Oath of Enmity.target: One enemy you can see in the burst
Oath of Enmity.effect:
When you make a melee attack against the target and the target is the only enemy adjacent to you, you make two attack rolls and use either result. This effect lasts until the end of the encounter or until the target drops to 0 hit points, at which point you regain the use of this power.
If another effect lets you roll twice and use the higher result when making an attack roll, this power has no effect on that attack. If an effect forces you to roll twice and use the lower result when making an attack roll, this power has no effect on that attack either.
If an effect lets you reroll an attack roll and you rolled twice because of this power, you reroll both dice.

Overwhelming Strike.name: Overwhelming Strike
Overwhelming Strike.flavor: As you attack, you maneuver around your foe, forcing it to move with you.
Overwhelming Strike.onHit:
1[W] + Wisdom modifier damage. You shift 1 square and slide the target 1 square into the space you occupied.
Level 21: 2[W] + Wisdom modifier damage.

Avenging Winds.name: Avenging Winds
Avenging Winds.flavor: You whisper a prayer, calling a gust of wind that slams your foe and halts its movement if it tries to escape.
Avenging Winds.onHit: 2d8 + Wisdom modifier damage. Until the end of your next turn, if the target moves, you can slide it 2 squares as an immediate reaction.

Halo of Fire.name: Halo of Fire
Halo of Fire.flavor: A circle of flame erupts around your foe, harming any other enemy that moves near the creature.
Halo of Fire.onHit: 2[W] + Wisdom modifier fire damage. Until the end of your next turn, any enemy that ends its turn adjacent to the target takes 5 fire damage.
Halo of Fire.censureOfRetribution: The fire damage equals 5 + your Intelligence modifier.

Splinter the Formation.name: Splinter the Formation
Splinter the Formation.flavor: You strike your foe and, with a wave of astral energy, you sweep away other enemies, isolating your prey.
Splinter the Formation.onHit: 1[W] + Wisdom modifier damage, and you teleport each enemy within 2 squares of the target 2 squares.
Splinter the Formation.censureOfRetribution: The number of squares you teleport each enemy equals 1 + your Intelligence modifier.

Blade Step.name: Blade Step
Blade Step.flavor: As you strike one foe, you teleport next to another.
Blade Step.onHit: 2[W] + Wisdom modifier damage, and you teleport 10 squares to a space that must be adjacent to an enemy.

Whirling Blades.name: Whirling Blades
Whirling Blades.flavor: When you have your foe alone, it becomes an easy target for your vicious cuts and lunges.
Whirling Blades.attack: Wisdom vs. AC. You gain a +2 bonus to the attack roll if no enemy is adjacent to the target.
Whirling Blades.onHit: 3[W] + Wisdom modifier damage. The attack deals 5 extra damage if no enemy is adjacent to the target.

Ready the Final Blow.name: Ready the Final Blow
Ready the Final Blow.flavor: Your attack leaves your foe frozen in place, less able to avoid your next assault.
Ready the Final Blow.onHit: 2[W] + Wisdom modifier damage, and the target is immobilized until the end of your next turn. You gain a +2 bonus to your next attack roll against the target before the end of your next turn.
Ready the Final Blow.censureOfPursuit: The bonus to the attack roll equals 2 + your Dexterity modifier.

Warding Blade.name: Warding Blade
Warding Blade.flavor: Your weapon cracks with thunder as it slams into your foe, knocking any nearby enemies away. If any other foes draw too close, your thunder-infused weapon is ready to punish them.
Warding Blade.onHit: 2[W] + Wisdom modifier thunder damage, and you push any enemy within 2 squares of you, other than the target, 2 squares. Until the end of your next turn, if any enemy other than the target enters a square adjacent to you or hits or misses you from a square within your reach, you can make a melee basic attack against that enemy as an opportunity action.
Warding Blade.censureOfRetribution: You gain a power bonus to the attack roll of the melee basic attack equal to your Intelligence modifier.

Astral Fury.name: Astral Fury
Astral Fury.flavor: You send your foes tumbling through the Astral Sea, teleporting them a short distance and leaving them disoriented.
Astral Fury.onHit: 2d6 + Wisdom modifier psychic damage, and you teleport the target 3 squares. The target is immobilized until the end of your next turn.

Spectral Charge.name: Spectral Charge
Spectral Charge.flavor: As you move to engage your enemy, part of you leaves the physical world momentarily.
Spectral Charge.effect: Before the attack, you become insubstantial until the end of your next turn.
Spectral Charge.special: When charging, you can use this power in place of a melee basic attack. If you charge, you become insubstantial when you begin the charge.

Inevitable End.name: Inevitable End
Inevitable End.flavor: Your devastating attack should be enough to exact vengeance for your god. If it is not, and your foe escapes you this time, then you can try the attack again.
Inevitable End.censureOfPursuit: You gain a bonus to the attack roll equal to your Dexterity modifier.
Inevitable End.effect: If the target is still alive and not adjacent to you at the end of its next turn, you regain the use of this power. You can regain the use of this power in this manner once per encounter.

Scatter to the Astral Winds.name: Scatter to the Astral Winds
Scatter to the Astral Winds.flavor: As you strike your enemy, the winds of an astral tempest sweep over the area, carrying away your other foes.
Scatter to the Astral Winds.onHit: 3[W] + Wisdom modifier damage, and you teleport each enemy within 5 squares of you, other than the target, 5 squares.
Scatter to the Astral Winds.censureOfRetribution: The number of squares you teleport each enemy equals 4 + your Intelligence modifier.

Astral Charge.name: Astral Charge
Astral Charge.flavor: As you charge, energy from the Astral Sea empowers you, making your final attack stun your foe.
Astral Charge.onHit: 1[W] + Wisdom modifier damage, and the target is stunned until the end of your next turn.
Astral Charge.special: When charging, you can use this power in place of a melee basic attack.

Oath of the Final Duel.name: Oath of the Final Duel
Oath of the Final Duel.flavor: You swear an oath that you will slay the foe before you. As long as you work to fulfill this oath, that foe cannot escape.
Oath of the Final Duel.effect: Until the end of the encounter, if the target is more than 3 squares away from you at the start of your turn, you can teleport to a space within 3 squares of it as a minor action. This effect ends if you end your turn more than 3 squares away from the target.

Aspect of Might.name: Aspect of Might
Aspect of Might.flavor: You strike a crippling blow against your foe, and divine power bolsters you.
Aspect of Might.effect: Until the end of the encounter, you gain a +5 power bonus to Athletics checks, a +2 power bonus to speed, and a +2 power bonus to the damage rolls of melee attacks.

Dawn Fire Sigil.name: Dawn Fire Sigil
Dawn Fire Sigil.flavor: A glowing mark of divine radiance prevents your foe from hiding from you and increases the accuracy of your attacks.
Dawn Fire Sigil.effect: The target doesn’t benefit from cover or concealment against your attacks (save ends). The target can still benefit from superior cover or total concealment against your attacks. Until the end of the encounter, you gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls against the target.

Temple of Shadow.name: Temple of Shadow
Temple of Shadow.flavor: You channel dark energy around your foe, creating a cloud of shadows that helps conceal you from your enemies.
Temple of Shadow.effect: The attack creates a zone of swirling shadows in a burst 1 centered on the target. The zone lasts until the end of the encounter. When the target moves, the zone moves with it, remaining centered on it. While you are within the zone, you gain concealment and can make Stealth checks to become hidden. When you leave the zone, you have concealment until the end of your turn.

Enduring Strike.name: Enduring Strike
Enduring Strike.flavor: As you strike at your foe, you call on your god to cast away an effect that plagues you.
Enduring Strike.onHit: 3[W] + Wisdom modifier damage, and you make a saving throw with a +5 bonus.
Enduring Strike.onMiss: Half damage, and you make a saving throw.

Light of Truth.name: Light of Truth
Light of Truth.flavor: A brilliant shaft of light streaks down from above and fixes on the enemy you touch. In the merciless light, your enemy suffers pain commensurate with the number of your friends near it.
Light of Truth.onHit: 1d10 + Wisdom modifier radiant damage, and ongoing 10 radiant damage (save ends).
Light of Truth.onMiss: Half damage, and ongoing 5 radiant damage (save ends).
Light of Truth.effect: When the target rolls any saving throw before the ongoing damage ends, the target takes a penalty to the saving throw equal to the number of your allies adjacent to it.

Aspect of Speed.name: Aspect of Speed
Aspect of Speed.flavor: You accelerate past your foes, making an attack and then darting away.
Aspect of Speed.effect: Before and after the attack, you shift 5 squares.

Oath of Pursuit.name: Oath of Pursuit
Oath of Pursuit.flavor: As you attack your foe, you swear an oath of relentless pursuit against it. Although your foe might try to escape, it can never evade you.
Oath of Pursuit.effect: Until the end of the encounter, if the target moves on its turn, you can shift 3 squares at the end of the target’s turn as an opportunity action. You must end this movement closer to the target.

Final Oath.name: Final Oath
Final Oath.flavor: Delivering a wicked blow, you swear to your god that either you or your foe shall die this day.
Final Oath.effect: Until the end of the encounter, you and the target gain a +5 bonus to attack rolls against each other.

Aspect of Fury.name: Aspect of Fury
Aspect of Fury.flavor: You channel the anger of your god, creating a cloud of whirling death around you.
Aspect of Fury.effect: Until the end of the encounter, any enemy that starts its turn adjacent to you or that hits or misses you with a melee attack takes 5 damage.

Aspect of Awe.name: Aspect of Awe
Aspect of Awe.flavor: Cloaking yourself in a divine glamor, you assault your foe’s mind and compel the creature to approach you.
Aspect of Awe.onHit: 4d8 + Wisdom modifier psychic damage, and you pull the target 3 squares. At the start of each of your turns, you pull the target 3 squares (save ends).
Aspect of Awe.onMiss: Half damage, and you pull the target 2 squares. At the start of your next turn, you pull the target 3 squares.

Aspect of Terror.name: Aspect of Terror
Aspect of Terror.flavor: You take on a terrifying aspect, assaulting your enemies’ minds and making them loath to attack you.
Aspect of Terror.onHit: 5d6 + Wisdom modifier psychic damage, and you push the target 3 squares. If the target hits or misses you, it is stunned until the end of its next turn (save ends).
Aspect of Terror.onMiss: Half damage. If the target hits or misses you before the end of your next turn, the target is stunned until the end of its next turn.

Aspect of Death.name: Aspect of Death
Aspect of Death.flavor: You become a bearer of death. As long as you remain near your chosen foe, it suffers a foretaste of death.
Aspect of Death.onHit: 6[W] + Wisdom modifier damage, and the target takes 10 damage at the start of its turn if you are within 5 squares of it (save ends).
Aspect of Death.onMiss: Half damage, and the target takes 5 damage at the start of its turn if you are within 5 squares of it (save ends).

Oath of the Inevitable Blade.name: Oath of the Inevitable Blade
Oath of the Inevitable Blade.flavor: You swear that your blade shall taste your foe’s blood, and even if your attack fails to draw blood, you are assured of a later success.
Oath of the Inevitable Blade.onMiss: Half damage. You gain a +5 power bonus to your next damage roll against the target before the end of the encounter, unless you attack another creature first.

Vengeful Recovery.name: Vengeful Recovery
Vengeful Recovery.flavor: You visit the pain of your wounds upon your foe as you draw strength and health from your god.
Vengeful Recovery.onHit: 3[W] + Wisdom modifier damage, and the target is dazed (save ends). You regain hit points as if you had spent a healing surge.
Vengeful Recovery.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn. You can spend a healing surge.

Fiery Vengeance.name: Fiery Vengeance
Fiery Vengeance.flavor: With a fearsome cry, you transfer the pain of your wounds into an outburst of cleansing fire.
Fiery Vengeance.onHit: 7d6 + Wisdom modifier fire and radiant damage.
Fiery Vengeance.effect: You regain hit points as if you had spent a healing surge. Until the end of the encounter, any enemy that ends its turn adjacent to you takes 10 fire and radiant damage.

Executioner's Justice.name: Executioner's Justice
Executioner's Justice.flavor: Your attack sears your enemy’s mind as much as its body, and sends it spiraling down a painful path toward annihilation.
Executioner's Justice.onHit: 4[W] + Wisdom modifier psychic damage, and the target is dazed (save ends).
Executioner's Justice.firstFailedSavingThrow: The target is stunned instead of dazed (save ends).
Executioner's Justice.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is dazed (save ends).

Sigil of Damnation.name: Sigil of Damnation
Sigil of Damnation.flavor: A horrid sigil appears on your enemy’s head, marking the creature as damned.
Sigil of Damnation.effect: Until the end of the encounter, when you miss the target with an avenger encounter attack power, the attack deals half damage.

Sigil of Carceri.name: Sigil of Carceri
Sigil of Carceri.flavor: You mark your enemy with the baleful red sigil of Carceri, the prison realm of the gods. Spectral chains surround your foe, holding it in place and shielding your allies from its attacks.
Sigil of Carceri.onHit: 2d10 + Wisdom modifier force damage. The target is immobilized, and its attacks against creatures more than 5 squares away from it automatically miss (save ends both).
Sigil of Carceri.onMiss: Half damage. Until the end of your next turn, the target is immobilized, and its attacks against creatures more than 5 squares away from it automatically miss.

Temple of Respite.name: Temple of Respite
Temple of Respite.flavor: Radiant power sears and slows your foe and forms a divine pattern that bolsters your defenses and hinders your enemies’ movement.
Temple of Respite.onHit: 3[W] + Wisdom modifier radiant damage, and the target is slowed (save ends).
Temple of Respite.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is slowed until the end of your next turn.
Temple of Respite.effect: The attack creates a zone of radiance in a close burst 1. The zone lasts until the end of the encounter. While you are within the zone, you gain a +2 bonus to all defenses. The zone is difficult terrain to enemies.

Temple of Resolution.name: Temple of Resolution
Temple of Resolution.flavor: As you strike, a prison of radiant blades appears around you and your foe, ensuring that no other enemies interfere with your battle.
Temple of Resolution.effect: The attack creates a zone of radiant energy in a close burst 2. The zone lasts until the end of the encounter. The target takes 25 radiant damage whenever it leaves the zone. Any enemy other than the target takes 25 radiant damage when entering the zone or ending its turn there. An enemy that enters or leaves the zone as a result of forced movement does not take this damage.

Aspect of Agility.name: Aspect of Agility
Aspect of Agility.flavor: You move with the speed of the west wind, leaving your foes with little chance of striking you.
Aspect of Agility.effect: You shift 5 squares, and you gain a +2 bonus to AC and Reflex until the end of your next turn.

Oath of the Relentless Hunter.name: Oath of the Relentless Hunter
Oath of the Relentless Hunter.flavor: You touch an enemy and swear an oath to hunt it to the end of the world. With this oath, you can always find your foe.
Oath of the Relentless Hunter.effect: Until you use this power on a different target, you can take a standard action to determine the distance and the direction to the target. The distance and the direction are based on a straight line between you and the target, ignoring any barriers. If the target is on a different plane from you, you know which plane but gain no other information.

Eye of Justice.name: Eye of Justice
Eye of Justice.flavor: Your eyes glow with divine energy, allowing you to spot foes no matter how well they hide.
Eye of Justice.effect: Until the end of your next turn, you can see invisible creatures within 5 squares of you.

Indomitable Resolve.name: Indomitable Resolve
Indomitable Resolve.flavor:
The power of the gods sustains you, allowing you to ignore an
injury.

Astral Cloak.name: Astral Cloak
Astral Cloak.flavor: With a glimmer of silvery mist, you fade from view for a brief time.
Astral Cloak.effect: You become invisible until the end of your turn.

Winds of the Astral Sea.name: Winds of the Astral Sea
Winds of the Astral Sea.flavor: Silvery mist shimmers around you, and you disappear, then reappear a short distance away.

Vengeful Revenant.name: Vengeful Revenant
Vengeful Revenant.flavor: Even the grip of death cannot keep you down. With hidden strength, you muster the energy to rise.
Vengeful Revenant.trigger: You fail a death saving throw
Vengeful Revenant.effect: You succeed on the death saving throw and spend a healing surge. You gain a +5 power bonus to all defenses until the end of your next turn.

Oath of the Final Strike.name: Oath of the Final Strike
Oath of the Final Strike.flavor: Nothing can prevent you from completing the task set before you by the gods, not even death.
Oath of the Final Strike.trigger: An attack reduces you to 0 hit points or fewer and doesn’t kill you
Oath of the Final Strike.effect: You are dying but don’t fall unconscious. Until the end of your next turn, you don’t take any damage after the triggering attack, and you gain a +4 bonus to attack rolls. At the end of your next turn, you fall unconscious if you are still dying.

Bulwark of Defiance.name: Bulwark of Defiance
Bulwark of Defiance.flavor: You push aside the pain of your foe’s attacks, allowing you to act without hindrance for a moment.
Bulwark of Defiance.trigger: You fail a saving throw other than a death saving throw
Bulwark of Defiance.effect: Until the end of your next turn, the effect you failed the saving throw against doesn’t affect you, but you make saving throws against it as normal.

Abjure Undead.name: Abjure Undead
Abjure Undead.flavor: You send a brilliant ray of radiant power at an undead foe, compelling it to stagger toward you.
Abjure Undead.channelDivinity: You can use only one channel divinity power per encounter
Abjure Undead.target: One undead creature in the burst
Abjure Undead.onHit:
3d10 + Wisdom modifier radiant damage, and you pull the target a number of squares equal to 1 + your Wisdom modifier. The target is also immobilized until the end of your next turn.
Level 5: 4d10 + Wisdom modifier damage.
Level 11: 5d10 + Wisdom modifier damage.
Level 15: 6d10 + Wisdom modifier damage.
Level 21: 7d10 + Wisdom modifier damage.
Level 25: 8d10 + Wisdom modifier damage.
Abjure Undead.onMiss: Half damage, and you pull the target 1 square.

Divine Guidance.name: Divine Guidance
Divine Guidance.flavor: You lend your deity’s guidance to an ally’s attack against your foe.
Divine Guidance.channelDivinity: You can use only one channel divinity power per encounter
Divine Guidance.trigger: An ally within 10 squares of you makes an attack roll against your oath of enmity target
Divine Guidance.effect: The target makes a second attack roll and uses either result.

Bond of Pursuit.name: Bond of Pursuit
Bond of Pursuit.flavor: With your attack, you utter a promise to follow your enemy if it tries to escape.
Bond of Pursuit.onHit:
1[W] + Wisdom modifier damage. If the target doesn’t end its next turn adjacent to you, you can shift a number of squares equal to 1 + your Dexterity modifier as a free action, and you must end that shift closer to the target.
Level 21: 2[W] + Wisdom modifier damage.

Bond of Retribution.name: Bond of Retribution
Bond of Retribution.flavor: Whirling divine energy promises swift retribution if one of your foe’s companions attacks you.
Bond of Retribution.onHit:
1[W] + Wisdom modifier damage. The first time an enemy other than the target hits or misses you before the end of your next turn, the target takes radiant damage equal to your Intelligence modifier.
Level 21: 2[W] + Wisdom modifier damage.

Angelic Alacrity.name: Angelic Alacrity
Angelic Alacrity.flavor: You focus divine energy through your body to gain uncanny  speed as you make your attack.
Angelic Alacrity.effect: Before the attack, you shift 2 squares.
Angelic Alacrity.censureOfPursuit: The number of squares you shift equals 1 + your Dexterity modifier.

Shared Madness.name: Shared Madness
Shared Madness.flavor: The wrath of your god sears the mind of one foe and echoes to assault another enemy as well.
Shared Madness.onHit: 1d10 + Wisdom modifier psychic damage, and a second creature you can see takes the same damage.

Blessing of Vengeance.name: Blessing of Vengeance
Blessing of Vengeance.flavor: With the death of your foe, your god grants you a boon.
Blessing of Vengeance.trigger: Your oath of enmity target drops to 0 hit points
Blessing of Vengeance.effect: You gain temporary hit points equal to your healing surge value.

Distracting Flare.name: Distracting Flare
Distracting Flare.flavor: Divine light surrounds you, providing a distraction while you slip away unseen.
Distracting Flare.effect: You become invisible and move your speed. You are invisible until the end of the movement.

Refocus Enmity.name: Refocus Enmity
Refocus Enmity.flavor: After searching your soul, you realize who your true foe is and swear an oath against it.
Refocus Enmity.target: One creature you can see in the burst
Refocus Enmity.effect: The target becomes the target of your oath of enmity, replacing the current target.

Deflecting Thunder.name: Deflecting Thunder
Deflecting Thunder.flavor: A thunderclap batters your foe as your weapon connects, and another thunderclap deflects the next attack against you, turning the attack toward a nearby foe.
Deflecting Thunder.onHit: 1[W] + Wisdom modifier thunder damage. Until the end of your next turn, the next melee or ranged attack against you instead targets an enemy adjacent to you other than the attacker.

Bond of Foresight.name: Bond of Foresight
Bond of Foresight.flavor: A bond of fate links you to your enemy, giving you the ability to foresee its every move. Whenever it moves or attacks you, you’re ready.
Bond of Foresight.effect: When the target hits or misses you or shifts, the target provokes an opportunity attack from you (save ends).

Wrath of the Divine.name: Wrath of the Divine
Wrath of the Divine.flavor: Suffering a foe’s lucky attack, you call on your god to visit your pain upon the one you have sworn to kill.
Wrath of the Divine.trigger: An enemy scores a critical hit against you
Wrath of the Divine.target: Your oath of enmity target in the burst
Wrath of the Divine.effect: The target takes radiant damage equal to the critical hit’s damage.

Avenger's Readiness.name: Avenger's Readiness
Avenger's Readiness.flavor: As your opponents prepare to strike, you make a sudden move to spoil their plans.
Avenger's Readiness.trigger: You roll initiative at the beginning of an encounter
Avenger's Readiness.effect: You gain a +5 power bonus to the initiative check. You shift 3 squares as a free action when the first creature in the initiative order starts its turn, even if you’re surprised.

Channel Endurance.name: Channel Endurance
Channel Endurance.flavor: You focus your inner strength and tap into your god’s power to forestall an injury.
Channel Endurance.effect: You gain resist 5 to all damage until the end of your next turn.

Cloud of Souls.name: Cloud of Souls
Cloud of Souls.flavor: As you swing your weapon, you speak a prayer for your foe’s innocent victims and summon them to torment your enemies.
Cloud of Souls.onHit: 2[W] + Wisdom modifier psychic damage. The attack creates a zone of shrieking souls in a close burst 1. The zone lasts until the end of your next turn or until you dismiss it as a minor action. Any enemy that enters the zone is dazed until the end of your next turn.
Cloud of Souls.censureOfRetribution: Until the end of your next turn, you gain a bonus to attack rolls against the target equal to one-half your Intelligence modifier.

Sequestering Word.name: Sequestering Word
Sequestering Word.flavor: A word of divine power thunders from your mouth, smiting your foe and transporting it to a place where you can face it alone.
Sequestering Word.onHit: 2d8 + Wisdom modifier thunder damage, and you teleport the target 5 squares. You then teleport to a space adjacent to the target.
Sequestering Word.censureOfPursuit: Until the end of your next turn, any enemy that ends its turn adjacent to you takes thunder damage equal to 5 + your Dexterity modifier.

Bond of the Sacred Duel.name: Bond of the Sacred Duel
Bond of the Sacred Duel.flavor: In your single-minded devotion to destroying your chosen foe, you strike at that foe and form a psychic bond with it that causes it to suffer if its allies attack you.
Bond of the Sacred Duel.effect: Until the end of the encounter or until you attack anyone other than the target, the target takes 5 psychic damage whenever another enemy hits you.

Oath of Divine Lightning.name: Oath of Divine Lightning
Oath of Divine Lightning.flavor: Lightning erupts around your weapon as you attack your foe, then lingers, promising punishment if your enemy remains in one place for too long.
Oath of Divine Lightning.onHit: 3[W] + Wisdom modifier lightning damage. The target takes 5 lightning damage at the end of its turn if it doesn’t move at least 1 square during its turn (save ends). Shifting doesn’t count toward this movement.
Oath of Divine Lightning.onMiss: Half damage, and the target takes 5 lightning damage at the end of its next turn if it doesn’t move at least 1 square during that turn. Shifting doesn’t count toward this movement.

Ghostly Vengeance.name: Ghostly Vengeance
Ghostly Vengeance.flavor: You slip between this world and the Astral Sea, allowing you to move through objects and protecting you from attacks.
Ghostly Vengeance.effect: Until the end of the encounter, you gain phasing, and you take half damage from opportunity attacks.

Twin Step.name: Twin Step
Twin Step.flavor: You appear next to a foe, launch a devastating assault, and then disappear beyond its reach.
Twin Step.effect: You teleport 8 squares. As the last action of your turn, you can teleport 8 squares as a free action.

Bond of Justice.name: Bond of Justice
Bond of Justice.flavor: You strike your foe in an eruption of searing radiance, creating a bond between your spirits. If that foe moves away from you, you can teleport to its side and attack it.
Bond of Justice.onHit: 4[W] + Wisdom modifier radiant damage. If the target is not adjacent to you at the start of your next turn, you gain a +4 bonus to attack rolls against it until the end of that turn, and during that turn, you can teleport to a space adjacent to the target as a move action.
Bond of Justice.censureOfPursuit: When you use this power to teleport adjacent to the target, it takes radiant damage equal to 5 + your Dexterity modifier.

Phase Duel.name: Phase Duel
Phase Duel.flavor: You knock your opponent out of phase with the world and join it in a solitary duel to the death. You both remain visible as hazy outlines in the world, but no other creature can touch either of you.
Phase Duel.onHit: 3[W] + Wisdom modifier damage. Until the end of your next turn, you and the target are immobilized. In addition, no other creature has line of sight or line of effect to either of you, and the two of you have line of sight and line of effect only to each other. This effect ends if the immobilized condition ends on either of you before the end of your next turn.
Phase Duel.censureOfRetribution: Until the end of your next turn, you gain a bonus to all defenses against the target’s attacks equal to your Intelligence modifier.

Bond of Destiny.name: Bond of Destiny
Bond of Destiny.flavor: You insert a fragment of your spirit into your enemy’s mind. Until that enemy ejects the fragment, you can transport yourself to the enemy’s side.
Bond of Destiny.effect: The target suffers a bond of destiny (save ends). Until the bond ends, you can teleport to a space adjacent to the target as a minor action. You don’t need line of sight to the destination space.
Bond of Destiny.aftereffect: You can teleport to a space adjacent to the target as a free action once. You don’t need line of sight to the destination space.

Death Stroke.name: Death Stroke
Death Stroke.flavor: When your foe’s allies are distracted and distant, you deal a deadly attack.
Death Stroke.attack: Wisdom vs. AC. You gain a +4 bonus to the attack roll if no enemy is adjacent to the target.
Death Stroke.onHit: 4[W] + Wisdom modifier damage. The attack deals 2[W] extra damage if no enemy is adjacent to the target.

Living Death Strike.name: Living Death Strike
Living Death Strike.flavor: As you attack your chosen foe, you channel part of your own soul into your weapon.
Living Death Strike.effect: You can lose a healing surge to deal an additional 2[W] necrotic damage.

Soul Seeker.name: Soul Seeker
Soul Seeker.flavor: You call forth a spirit of necromantic hunger, allowing it to harvest the life force of your enemies.
Soul Seeker.effect: A soul-consuming spirit from the land of the dead appears in an unoccupied square within range. The soul seeker counts as an ally for the purpose of flanking. Whenever you reduce an enemy that is adjacent to the soul seeker to 0 hit points or fewer, you heal a number of hit points equal to your Wisdom modifier. If you reduce the target of your oath of enmity to 0 hit points or fewer, you can use your oath of enmity power as a free action against a target adjacent to your soul seeker.
Soul Seeker.sustainMinor: The soul seeker persists and you can move it 5 squares. The soul seeker ignores difficult terrain. The soul seeker vanishes at the end of your turn if it is out of your line of sight.

Light and Darkness.name: Light and Darkness
Light and Darkness.flavor: As you send a soul upon its final journey, divine energy strikes out from you and your foe in equal measure but opposite character.
Light and Darkness.onHit: 1[W] + Wisdom modifier damage. If this attack reduces the target to 0 hit points, enemies adjacent to the target take 5 necrotic damage and enemies adjacent to you take 5 radiant damage.

Fated Doom.name: Fated Doom
Fated Doom.flavor: Your strike hurls your foe into death’s embrace, and the Raven Queen rewards you with renewed vigor.
Fated Doom.effect: If this attack reduces your target to 0 hit points or fewer, you regain a spent healing surge.

Bond of Censure.name: Bond of Censure
Bond of Censure.flavor: You compel your enemy to come forward and face judgment.
Bond of Censure.attack: Wisdom vs. Will. If the target is your oath of enmity target and no enemies are adjacent to you, you can make two attack rolls and use either result.
Bond of Censure.onHit:
You pull the target a number of squares equal to your Intelligence modifier. If the target ends this movement adjacent to you, it takes 1d10 radiant damage.
Level 21: 2d10 radiant damage.

Day's First Light.name: Day's First Light
Day's First Light.flavor: You envelop your foe in a burning shroud of light. If the foe moves, the brilliance scorches it.
Day's First Light.onHit: 1d8 + Wisdom modifier radiant damage. If the target willingly moves before the start of your next turn, it takes 5 + your Wisdom modifier radiant damage.

Pass at Arms.name: Pass at Arms
Pass at Arms.flavor: Your strike creates an opening that you or a nearby ally can use to change position. If you take advantage of the opening, you can force your foe to move.
Pass at Arms.onHit: 2[W] + Wisdom modifier damage. You or an ally adjacent to the target can then shift 1 square as a free action.
Pass at Arms.censureOfUnity: If you shift, rather than your ally, you can slide the target into the space you left.

Shielded by Faith.name: Shielded by Faith
Shielded by Faith.flavor: The words of your prayer lend power to your strike while shielding you from the interference of your enemies.
Shielded by Faith.onHit: 2[W] + Wisdom modifier damage. Until the end of your next turn, you gain a +2 power bonus to all defenses against attacks made by creatures other than the target.

Speed and Stillness.name: Speed and Stillness
Speed and Stillness.flavor: You move in a blur, and your strike places a glowing sigil above your enemy. The sigil’s strength flows back to you if that enemy moves.
Speed and Stillness.effect: Before the attack, you shift 1 square.
Speed and Stillness.censureOfPursuit: The number of squares you shift equals your Dexterity modifier.
Speed and Stillness.onHit: 1[W] + Wisdom modifier radiant damage. If the target moves on its turn before the end of your next turn, you gain 5 temporary hit points.

Argent Mantle.name: Argent Mantle
Argent Mantle.flavor: You channel divine light and thunder through your holy symbol, smiting enemies nearby. For the rest of the battle, a mantle of silver light clings to your shoulders, a sign of divine favor.
Argent Mantle.effect: Until the end of the encounter, you can reroll the damage roll for any avenger attack power you use, including this one, and you must use the second result.
Argent Mantle.onHit: 2d10 + Wisdom modifier radiant and thunder damage.

Celestial Fist.name: Celestial Fist
Celestial Fist.flavor: A great fist of light smashes down at your enemy, and then holds the foe fast in its grip.
Celestial Fist.onHit: 2d10 + Wisdom modifier radiant damage, and the target is immobilized (save ends).
Celestial Fist.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is immobilized until the end of your next turn.

Strength of Many.name: Strength of Many
Strength of Many.flavor: You call on the loyalty and courage of your allies to strike a mighty blow.
Strength of Many.effect: Whenever you make a damage roll before the end of your next turn, you gain a +2 bonus for each ally within 2 squares of you.

Thunder and Echo.name: Thunder and Echo
Thunder and Echo.flavor: Thunder rides your weapon and then reverberates around you.
Thunder and Echo.onHit: 1[W] + Wisdom modifier damage plus 1d10 thunder damage.
Thunder and Echo.effect: Make a secondary attack that is a close burst 2.
Thunder and Echo.secondaryTarget: Each enemy in the burst other than the primary target
Thunder and Echo.secondaryOnHit: 1d6 + Wisdom modifier thunder damage, and you push the secondary target 2 squares.

Wings of Light.name: Wings of Light
Wings of Light.flavor: Shining wings sprout from your shoulders for a moment, carrying you swiftly to your sworn foe.
Wings of Light.effect: Before the attack, you can fly 6 squares and must land in a square adjacent to your oath of enmity target. This movement does not provoke opportunity attacks.

Avenger's Resolve.name: Avenger's Resolve
Avenger's Resolve.flavor: For a few moments, your faith infuses you with supernatural toughness.
Avenger's Resolve.trigger: An enemy other than your oath of enmity target hits you
Avenger's Resolve.effect: You gain resist 5 to all damage until the end of your next turn.

Enduring Spirit.name: Enduring Spirit
Enduring Spirit.flavor: The strength of your spirit shines most brightly in adversity.
Enduring Spirit.effect: You gain a +4 bonus to all defenses until the end of your next turn.

Loyal Sanction.name: Loyal Sanction
Loyal Sanction.flavor: You bless your comrade’s efforts to aid you in the defeat of your chosen foe.
Loyal Sanction.effect: Until the end of your next turn, the target gains a power bonus to damage rolls against your oath of enmity target equal to your Wisdom modifier.

Righteous Pursuit.name: Righteous Pursuit
Righteous Pursuit.flavor: Try as your enemy might, there’s no escaping your wrath.
Righteous Pursuit.trigger: Your oath of enmity target ends its turn in a square not adjacent to you
Righteous Pursuit.effect: You shift a number of squares equal to your Wisdom modifier and must end this movement as close to your oath of enmity target as possible.

Silver Shadow.name: Silver Shadow
Silver Shadow.flavor: You cloak yourself in astral mist, which guards you from harm.
Silver Shadow.effect: You gain temporary hit points equal to 5 + your level. You also gain concealment, which lasts until you have no temporary hit points.

Deadly Stride.name: Deadly Stride
Deadly Stride.flavor: No obstacle can stop you from visiting righteous fury on your foe.
Deadly Stride.effect: Before the attack, you shift a number of squares equal to one-half your speed. You gain phasing during this movement.

Fury's Advance.name: Fury's Advance
Fury's Advance.flavor: A quick flick of your weapon forces the enemy to stumble backward.
Fury's Advance.onHit: 1[W] damage. You push the target 1 square, and it takes 3 damage for each of your allies adjacent to it after the push. You then shift 1 square to a square adjacent to the target.
Fury's Advance.censureOfUnity: The number of squares you push and shift equals your Intelligence modifier. You still must end the shift adjacent to the target.

Intervening Blades.name: Intervening Blades
Intervening Blades.flavor: Mystic echoes of your weapon weave around your target after your blow strikes home, interfering with your foe’s attacks.
Intervening Blades.onHit: 2[W] + Wisdom modifier damage, and the target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls until the end of your next turn.
Intervening Blades.censureOfPursuit: You can use this power as an opportunity attack against your oath of enmity target.

Sparking Wounds.name: Sparking Wounds
Sparking Wounds.flavor: The sparks after your strike warn off your enemy’s companions.
Sparking Wounds.onHit: 1[W] + Wisdom modifier damage. At the end of the target’s next turn, each enemy adjacent to the target takes 5 fire and lightning damage, and if no enemies are adjacent to it, the target takes 5 fire and lightning damage.
Sparking Wounds.censureOfRetribution: If no other creatures are adjacent to the target when the attack hits, you gain a bonus to the damage roll equal to your Intelligence modifier.

Dance of Flame.name: Dance of Flame
Dance of Flame.flavor: Multicolored flames dance across your weapon and ignite your enemy, erupting onto other enemies the longer the flames dance.
Dance of Flame.effect: The target takes ongoing 5 fire damage (save ends).
Dance of Flame.eachFailedSavingThrow: An enemy of your choice within 5 squares of the target takes ongoing 5 fire damge (save ends).

Menacing Presence.name: Menacing Presence
Menacing Presence.flavor: You attack and then emanate divine menace, weakening the resolve of nearby foes.
Menacing Presence.effect: Until the end of the encounter, any enemy that starts its turn adjacent to you takes a -2 penalty to AC until the end of its next turn.

Nine Souls of Wrath.name: Nine Souls of Wrath
Nine Souls of Wrath.flavor: As you strike your enemy, you call forth souls to protect you. Streaming around you, they lash out at enemies nearby, weakening them.
Nine Souls of Wrath.effect: Until the end of the encounter, any enemy other than your oath of enmity target that ends its turn adjacent to you gains vulnerable 5 to all damage until the end of your next turn.

Oath of Righteous Fury.name: Oath of Righteous Fury
Oath of Righteous Fury.flavor: You swear an oath to reduce your enemies to ruin. Each slain foe renews your zeal.
Oath of Righteous Fury.effect: Until the end of the encounter, whenever your oath of enmity target drops to 0 hit points, you can shift a number of squares equal to your Dexterity modifier as a free action.

Aspect of Majesty.name: Aspect of Majesty
Aspect of Majesty.flavor: Your faith fills you with courage and mystically extends the reach of your attacks.
Aspect of Majesty.effect: Until the stance ends, you gain a +1 bonus to Will, and your melee reach increases by 1.

Harsh Lesson.name: Harsh Lesson
Harsh Lesson.flavor: You seek penance in the hope that your faults might be corrected.
Harsh Lesson.trigger: You miss every target with an avenger attack power
Harsh Lesson.effect: You take 5 damage, and you gain a +2 power bonus to attack rolls until the end of your next turn.

Step of Fate.name: Step of Fate
Step of Fate.flavor: Your world is in motion with your sworn enemy as its center.
Step of Fate.effect: Until the stance ends, you can use a free action to shift 1 square as the first action on each of your turns. You can’t end this movement farther away from your oath of enmity target than you started.

Celestia Endures.name: Celestia Endures
Celestia Endures.flavor: This prayer comes from a battle hymn of the War of Creation. Its uplifting words lend you strength.
Celestia Endures.onHit: 1[W] + Wisdom modifier damage. If this attack reduces the target to 0 hit points or if you have reduced your oath of enmity target to 0 hit points during this encounter, you can spend a healing surge. In addition, you gain a bonus to the damage rolls of your next attack before the end of your next turn equal to your Wisdom modifier.

Dismiss the Unworthy.name: Dismiss the Unworthy
Dismiss the Unworthy.flavor: You deal a stinging blow to your target and then speak a prayer of contemptuous dismissal, sending it away from you.
Dismiss the Unworthy.onHit: 2[W] + Wisdom modifier damage, and you push the target 1 square to a square adjacent to at least one of your allies.
Dismiss the Unworthy.censureOfUnity: The number of squares you push the target equals 1 + your Intelligence modifier. The target still must end this movement adjacent to at least one of your allies.

Excoriating Call.name: Excoriating Call
Excoriating Call.flavor: Your holy symbol flashes as you utter a mighty rebuke, which drives creatures away from you but draws your chosen foe closer.
Excoriating Call.onHit: You push the target 3 squares. If the target is your oath of enmity target, it instead takes 2d10 + your Wisdom modifier radiant damage, and you pull it to a square adjacent to you.

Inexorable Summons.name: Inexorable Summons
Inexorable Summons.flavor: When you call, your adversary must answer.
Inexorable Summons.onHit: 2d8 + Wisdom modifier radiant damage, and you teleport the target to a square adjacent to you.
Inexorable Summons.effect: When any enemy enters a square adjacent to you before the end of your next turn, the target takes 5 radiant damage. An enemy can take this damage only once per turn.
Inexorable Summons.censureOfRetribution: The radiant damage the target takes when any enemy enters a square adjacent to you equals 5 + your Intelligence modifier.

Blade of Guilt.name: Blade of Guilt
Blade of Guilt.flavor: At the touch of your weapon, your foe relives its misdeeds. Only by standing still can it keep the painful visions at bay.
Blade of Guilt.onHit: 2[W] + Wisdom modifier damage. The target takes 5 psychic damage for each square it enters willingly (save ends).
Blade of Guilt.onMiss: Half damage. Until the end of your next turn, the target takes 5 psychic damage for each square it enters willingly.

Glyph of Agony.name: Glyph of Agony
Glyph of Agony.flavor: Crimson runes flare into being above your enemies, flashing when they draw near.
Glyph of Agony.onHit: 1d10 + Wisdom modifier radiant damage, and you pull the target 1 square. The target takes 10 radiant damage if it starts its turn adjacent to you (save ends).
Glyph of Agony.aftereffect: If the target is adjacent to you, you push it 2 squares.

Holy Ardor.name: Holy Ardor
Holy Ardor.flavor: Your battle prayer transports you into a rapturous state, eyes blazing with fire. Your exaltation increases as your foe’s life slips away.
Holy Ardor.effect: The target takes ongoing 5 damage (save ends). Whenever the target takes this ongoing damage, you gain a power bonus to your next damage roll made before the end of your next turn against your oath of enmity target. The bonus equals your Wisdom modifier.

Winds of Woe.name: Winds of Woe
Winds of Woe.flavor: After you hit your foe, a dread wind whips around you, tossing aside your enemies.
Winds of Woe.effect: You make a secondary attack that is a close burst 1.
Winds of Woe.secondaryTarget: Each enemy in the burst other than the primary target
Winds of Woe.secondaryOnHit: You push the secondary target 1d4 squares.

Zealot's Call.name: Zealot's Call
Zealot's Call.flavor: Your prayer wrenches your foe from where it stands and makes it appear beside you.
Zealot's Call.onHit: 2d10 + Wisdom modifier psychic damage, and you teleport the target to a square adjacent to you. The target is dazed (save ends).
Zealot's Call.onMiss: Half damage, and you teleport the target to a square adjacent to you.
Zealot's Call.effect: Whenever you hit the target with a melee attack before the end of the encounter, you can shift 1 square and then slide the target to a square adjacent to you as a free action.

Ever Onward.name: Ever Onward
Ever Onward.flavor: You breathe the words of a restorative prayer. New vigor and swiftness course through you.
Ever Onward.effect: You can spend a healing surge. In addition, you gain a +2 power bonus to speed until the end of the encounter.

Leading Step.name: Leading Step
Leading Step.flavor: After your enemy strikes, you teleport away. An instant later, you bring the enemy after you.
Leading Step.trigger: An enemy adjacent to you damages you
Leading Step.effect: You teleport 5 squares and then teleport the target to a square adjacent to you.

Shielding Symbol.name: Shielding Symbol
Shielding Symbol.flavor: You channel divine power through your holy symbol to shield yourself.
Shielding Symbol.trigger: You are hit by an attack
Shielding Symbol.effect: Make a Wisdom attack using your implement. The result is your defense against the triggering attack.

Wings of Vengeance.name: Wings of Vengeance
Wings of Vengeance.flavor: Ephemeral wings carry you across the battlefield to strike where you are most needed.
Wings of Vengeance.effect: Until the end of your next turn, you gain a fly speed of 7, and you can hover.

Avenger's Demand.name: Avenger's Demand
Avenger's Demand.flavor: Your beckoning gesture compels the enemy to face swift justice.
Avenger's Demand.effect: You pull the target to a square adjacent to you, then make the following melee attack against it.
Avenger's Demand.onHit: 2[W] + Wisdom modifier damage, and you push the target 2 squares and knock it prone.
Avenger's Demand.censureOfPursuit: After you knock the target prone, you can shift 2 squares to a square adjacent to it.

Crimson Stride.name: Crimson Stride
Crimson Stride.flavor: You stride through nothingness, appearing at your enemy’s side to make a deadly attack. Then you stride away, carrying your foe with you.
Crimson Stride.effect: Before the attack, you teleport 5 squares to a square adjacent to an enemy.
Crimson Stride.onHit: 2[W] + Wisdom modifier damage. You teleport 5 squares and then teleport the target to a square adjacent to you.
Crimson Stride.censureOfRetribution: If no creatures are adjacent to either you or the target after you teleport it, the target takes damage equal to your Intelligence modifier.
Crimson Stride.censureOfUnity: If you teleport the target at least 2 squares, it takes 2 damage for each of your allies adjacent to it after the movement.

Dervish Strike.name: Dervish Strike
Dervish Strike.flavor: Spinning gracefully, you aim a deft strike that sends your enemy sprawling into its companions.
Dervish Strike.onHit: 3[W] + Wisdom modifier damage, and you push the primary target 5 squares. When you push it through any square occupied by an enemy, make a secondary attack.
Dervish Strike.secondaryOnHit: The secondary target is knocked prone.

Weaving Blades.name: Weaving Blades
Weaving Blades.flavor: You flourish your weapon in a dazzling display, striking your foe and any other that dares approach.
Weaving Blades.onHit: 2[W] + Wisdom modifier damage. Until the end of your next turn, any enemy other than the target that enters a square adjacent to you or starts its turn there is affected by your weaving blades: As a free action, you can deal 5 damage to it and push it 1 square. An enemy can take this damage only once per turn.

Forceful Call.name: Forceful Call
Forceful Call.flavor: Channeled through your weapon, astral winds propel your enemies toward you and then spirit you away when you deliver an attack.
Forceful Call.onHit: You pull the primary target 2 squares.
Forceful Call.secondaryOnHit: 3[W] + Wisdom modifier damage, plus 2 damage for each enemy adjacent to you.
Forceful Call.secondaryeffect: You teleport 1 square for each enemy adjacent to you after the secondary attack.

Ghostly Chains.name: Ghostly Chains
Ghostly Chains.flavor: At the touch of your weapon, phantasmal fetters appear around your enemy, hindering its steps.
Ghostly Chains.onHit: 3[W] + Wisdom modifier damage, and the target is slowed (save ends).
Ghostly Chains.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is slowed until the end of your next turn.
Ghostly Chains.special: If two or more of your allies are adjacent to the target, it is immobilized instead of slowed.

Inescapable Justice.name: Inescapable Justice
Inescapable Justice.flavor: No matter where your quarry goes, you are there.
Inescapable Justice.effect: Until the end of the encounter or until you or the target drops to 0 hit points, whenever you start your turn 3 or more squares away from the target, you can teleport to a square within 3 squares of it as a free action.

Soul Lightning.name: Soul Lightning
Soul Lightning.flavor: Your prayer sends lightning crackling through your enemy’s body and mind, and it arcs to nearby foes.
Soul Lightning.onHit: 3d10 + Wisdom modifier psychic damage, and ongoing 10 lightning damage (save ends).
Soul Lightning.onMiss: Half damage, and ongoing 5 lightning damage (save ends).
Soul Lightning.effect: Whenever the target takes this ongoing damage, each enemy within 2 squares of the target takes the same amount of lightning damage.

Temple of Brilliance.name: Temple of Brilliance
Temple of Brilliance.flavor: Your touch scours your foe with light, which lingers as a dazzling edifice over it.
Temple of Brilliance.effect: The attack creates a zone of radiant energy in a burst 2 centered on the target. The zone lasts until the end of your next turn. When the target moves, the zone moves with it, remaining centered on it. Any enemy other than the target that ends its turn within the zone is blinded until the end of its next turn.

Tether of Light.name: Tether of Light
Tether of Light.flavor: As you swing your weapon, you forge a thin strand of light between you and your adversary, and then leap through the brilliant void to another spot. Compelled by the tether, your enemy follows.
Tether of Light.onHit: 2[W] + Wisdom modifier damage. You teleport 5 squares and then teleport the target to a square adjacent to you.
Tether of Light.effect: When you hit the target with any melee attack before the end of the encounter, you can teleport a number of squares equal to your Intelligence modifier and then teleport the target to a square adjacent to you.

Zealous Onslaught.name: Zealous Onslaught
Zealous Onslaught.flavor: Trusting in your deity to guide your steps, you dash forward to smite your foe, sending it staggering away.
Zealous Onslaught.effect: Before the attack, you shift 5 squares.
Zealous Onslaught.onHit: 2[W] + Wisdom modifier damage, and you push the target 3 squares. The target grants combat advantage (save ends).
Zealous Onslaught.aftereffect: As a free action, you can teleport to a square adjacent to the target and make a melee basic attack.
Zealous Onslaught.onMiss: Half damage, and the target grants combat advantage until the end of your next turn.

Battle Blessing.name: Battle Blessing
Battle Blessing.flavor: You have sworn that your enemy shall fall—and it will, by your or your ally’s hand.
Battle Blessing.trigger: You or an ally within 5 squares of you makes an opportunity attack against your oath of enmity target
Battle Blessing.effect: The opportunity attack deals 1[W] extra damage if it's a weapon attack, or 1d8 extra damage if it is not a weapon attack.

Pillar of Chernoggar.name: Pillar of Chernoggar
Pillar of Chernoggar.flavor: You summon strength from the oppressive dominion of Chernoggar, slowing your enemies.
Pillar of Chernoggar.effect: Until the stance ends, any enemy that starts its turn adjacent to you is slowed until the end of your next turn.

Strength in Unity.name: Strength in Unity
Strength in Unity.flavor: The ties that join you and your friends become visible for a moment and serve as wards that shield you from harm.
Strength in Unity.effect: The damage of the triggering attack is reduced against you by an amount equal to your Intelligence modifier × the number of allies within 2 squares of you.

Summons to Duty.name: Summons to Duty
Summons to Duty.flavor: Your ally is propelled toward your foe in a burst of wind and light.
Summons to Duty.effect: You slide the target to a square adjacent to an enemy adjacent to you.

Temple of Seclusion.name: Temple of Seclusion
Temple of Seclusion.flavor: Fiery blue runes appear in the air around you, forming a pattern that scatters approaching creatures.
Temple of Seclusion.effect: Until the stance ends, when any creature ends its turn adjacent to you, you can teleport that creature 3 squares as a free action.

Accept No Defeat.name: Accept No Defeat
Accept No Defeat.flavor: Single-minded pursuit is usually your strength, but prayers, like plans, can be phrased with fallback maneuvers.
Accept No Defeat.onMiss: You shift 1 square and make a melee basic attack against a different creature, with a +4 bonus to the damage roll.

Lethal Intercession.name: Lethal Intercession
Lethal Intercession.flavor: Spiritual echoes of your weapon surround your foe, confounding its attacks.
Lethal Intercession.onHit: 3[W] + Wisdom modifier damage, and the target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls until the end of your next turn.
Lethal Intercession.censureOfPursuit: When you use this power against your oath of enmity target, the power is reliable.
Lethal Intercession.special: This power can be used as an opportunity attack against your oath of enmity target.

Punishing Blow.name: Punishing Blow
Punishing Blow.flavor: Your sworn enemy and all who stand with it must answer to you now.
Punishing Blow.onHit: 3[W] + Wisdom modifier damage. If the target is your oath of enmity target, each enemy adjacent to the target also counts as a target of your oath of enmity until the end of your next turn.

Vengeful Parry.name: Vengeful Parry
Vengeful Parry.flavor: You parry your enemy’s attack and make a riposte infused with holy power.
Vengeful Parry.trigger: An enemy adjacent to you hits or misses you
Vengeful Parry.effect: The target takes a -2 penalty to the attack roll. Make the following attack against the target.
Vengeful Parry.censureOfUnity: The penalty to the target’s attack roll equals your Intelligence modifier.
Vengeful Parry.onHit: 2[W] + Wisdom modifier damage. You shift 1 square and then slide the target 2 squares to a square adjacent to you.

Wrathful Charge.name: Wrathful Charge
Wrathful Charge.flavor: You dash across the battlefield, gaining momentum from each attack against you, until you slam into your enemy with your weapon.
Wrathful Charge.effect: You gain phasing and a +4 bonus to AC against opportunity attacks until the end of your turn. You then charge and make the following attack in place of a melee basic attack.
Wrathful Charge.onHit: 2[W] + Wisdom modifier damage. The attack deals 2 extra damage for each opportunity attack made against you during the charge movement.
Wrathful Charge.censureOfRetribution: The extra damage for each opportunity attack equals your Intelligence modifier.

Blade of Astral Hosts.name: Blade of Astral Hosts
Blade of Astral Hosts.flavor: You stride into the midst of your enemies, laying about with your weapon. For each foe you strike, a celestial blade forms alongside your own, lending might to your final attack.
Blade of Astral Hosts.effect: You teleport 5 squares and make a melee secondary attack.
Blade of Astral Hosts.secondaryOnHit: 3[W] + Wisdom modifier damage, plus 2 damage for each enemy hit by the primary attack.

Bonded by Blood.name: Bonded by Blood
Bonded by Blood.flavor: Your attack forges a bond between you and your enemy.
Bonded by Blood.effect: Whenever the target moves, you can teleport to a square adjacent to it as a free action after its movement is complete. This effect lasts until the end of the encounter or until you end your turn not adjacent to the target.

Flame Unquenchable.name: Flame Unquenchable
Flame Unquenchable.flavor: Your prayer sets your weapon ablaze with blue fire. A single thrust transfers the flames to your foe.
Flame Unquenchable.onHit: 3[W] + Wisdom modifier damage, and ongoing 10 fire damage (save ends).
Flame Unquenchable.onMiss: Half damage, and ongoing 5 fire damage (save ends).
Flame Unquenchable.effect: Until the end of the encounter, the target takes a -1 penalty to saving throws against ongoing damage. The penalty worsens by -1 for each creature taking ongoing damage within 10 squares of the target.

Stroke of Doom.name: Stroke of Doom
Stroke of Doom.flavor: You brandish your weapon, seeking to drag your foe toward you with divine force. Failing that, you leap to the foe. Either way, your weapon is charged with lethal power.
Stroke of Doom.onHit: You pull the target to a square adjacent to you.
Stroke of Doom.onMiss: You shift 5 squares to a square adjacent to the target.
Stroke of Doom.effect: Make a melee secondary attack against the target if it is adjacent to you.

Refuge of Piety.name: Refuge of Piety
Refuge of Piety.flavor: You clear your mind and magically slough off impediments.
Refuge of Piety.effect: You make a saving throw against each effect on you that a save can end. You shift 1 square for each save.

Seeker's Step.name: Seeker's Step
Seeker's Step.flavor: They might hit you once, but you’ ll be damned if they’ ll do it twice.
Seeker's Step.effect: Until the stance ends, whenever you are hit by an enemy’s melee or ranged attack, you can teleport 10 squares to a square adjacent to your oath of enmity target as an immediate reaction.

Shield of Providence.name: Shield of Providence
Shield of Providence.flavor: Uttering a quick prayer, you partially leave the physical realm for a moment and channel the power of your foe’s attack into your own.
Shield of Providence.trigger: An enemy hits you with an area or a close attack
Shield of Providence.effect: You become insubstantial until the end of your next turn. In addition, your next attack before the end of your next turn deals 2d10 extra damage.

Chains of Fate.name: Chains of Fate
Chains of Fate.flavor: As you attack, you mystically bind your sworn enemy’s fate to yours, causing it to share your injuries.
Chains of Fate.onHit: 3[W] + Wisdom modifier damage. Until the start of your next turn, you take half damage from any source and your oath of enmity target takes the other half.

Excoriating Challenge.name: Excoriating Challenge
Excoriating Challenge.flavor: Your holy symbol glows red as you curse your foes. The might of your rebuke hurls away nearby creatures but brings your chosen foe before you for judgment.
Excoriating Challenge.onHit: You teleport the target 5 squares to a square that is farther away from you. If the target is your oath of enmity target, it instead takes 4d10 + your Wisdom modifier radiant damage, and you teleport it to a square adjacent to you.

Fearsome Fury.name: Fearsome Fury
Fearsome Fury.flavor: Nothing clarifies your objective better than the terror in your enemies’ eyes.
Fearsome Fury.onHit: 4[W] + Wisdom modifier damage. Until the end of your next turn, when the target makes any attack roll, it takes a penalty to that attack roll equal to the number of your allies adjacent to it.
Fearsome Fury.censureOfUnity: The penalty equals the number of your allies adjacent to the target + your Intelligence modifier.

Threatening Strike.name: Threatening Strike
Threatening Strike.flavor: Your strike knocks your foe aside, and any hope it has of escaping is dashed when it finds your weapon in its face.
Threatening Strike.onHit: 3[W] + Wisdom modifier damage, and you slide the target 2 squares. If the target moves willingly before the start of your next turn, you can use an opportunity action to teleport to a square adjacent to it and make a melee basic attack against it.
Threatening Strike.censureOfRetribution: Until the end of your next turn, you gain a bonus to your basic attacks’ damage rolls equal to your Intelligence modifier.

Victory Hymn.name: Victory Hymn
Victory Hymn.flavor: You hum a hymn about a time when war will not be needed. But for now, you seek to end the fight as the victorious survivor.
Victory Hymn.onHit: 3[W] + Wisdom modifier damage. Before the end of your next turn, you gain a bonus to your next attack’s damage rolls equal to your Wisdom modifier.
Victory Hymn.effect: If this attack reduces the target to 0 hit points or if you have reduced your oath of enmity target to 0 hit points during this encounter, you can spend a healing surge and make a saving throw.

Amber Prisons.name: Amber Prisons
Amber Prisons.flavor: When you pull your hand away from your enemy, it leaves behind an amber sigil from which shines an eerie light. Those touched by its glow become encased in amber sarcophagi.
Amber Prisons.onHit: 5d8 + Wisdom modifier radiant damage, and the primary target is immobilized (save ends).
Amber Prisons.onMiss: Half damage, and the primary target is immobilized until the end of your next turn.
Amber Prisons.effect:
Make a secondary attack that is a close burst 1, using
the primary target’s space as the origin square.
Amber Prisons.secondaryTarget: Each enemy in the burst other than the primary target
Amber Prisons.secondaryOnHit: You slide the secondary target 3 squares, and it is immobilized until the end of your next turn.
Amber Prisons.secondaryOnMiss: The secondary target is slowed until the end of your next turn.

Drawn by Fate.name: Drawn by Fate
Drawn by Fate.flavor: Two shimmering portals appear, drawing you or your enemy to find your fate.
Drawn by Fate.onHit: You teleport the target to a square adjacent to you.
Drawn by Fate.onMiss: You teleport to a square adjacent to the target.
Drawn by Fate.effect: Make a melee secondary attack against the target using your weapon. In addition, the target is drawn by fate (save ends). Until this effect ends, you can teleport the target to a square adjacent to you as a minor action.

Mantle of the Astral Champion.name: Mantle of the Astral Champion
Mantle of the Astral Champion.flavor: As you attack, your prayer bestows on you the mantle of the astral champion, allowing you to fly like an angelic being.
Mantle of the Astral Champion.effect: Until the end of the encounter, you gain phasing and a fly speed of 6, and you can hover.

Thunderhead Smite.name: Thunderhead Smite
Thunderhead Smite.flavor: You present your holy symbol with a shouted prayer, causing a shock wave to scatter your foes, and thunder crashes over an enemy that remains behind.
Thunderhead Smite.effect: One enemy adjacent to you takes 10 thunder damage for each target hit. If no enemy is adjacent to you, you regain the use of this power.

Anvil of Faith.name: Anvil of Faith
Anvil of Faith.flavor: Summoning strength from your comrades’ courage, you deliver a mighty blow that tosses your enemy across the battlefield.
Anvil of Faith.onHit: 3[W] + Wisdom modifier damage, and you push the target a number of squares equal to the number of your allies adjacent to it. The target takes 5 damage for each square it enters during the forced movement.
Anvil of Faith.censureOfUnity: The target is knocked prone at the end of the forced movement.

Brilliant Halo.name: Brilliant Halo
Brilliant Halo.flavor: As you hurl divine light at your enemy, a scintillating halo appears above you. Any enemy that approaches is burned in its glow.
Brilliant Halo.onHit: 4d6 + Wisdom modifier radiant damage. Until the end of your next turn, any enemy that ends its turn within 5 squares of you takes 5 radiant damage, and you regain 5 hit points.
Brilliant Halo.censureOfRetribution: Your Intelligence modifier is added to the damage and healing caused when an enemy ends its turn within 5 squares of you.

Hand of Silver.name: Hand of Silver
Hand of Silver.flavor: Your hand shines with a silvery light as you touch your enemy, preventing its escape.
Hand of Silver.onHit: 2d12 + Wisdom modifier radiant damage, and the target is restrained until the end of your next turn.
Hand of Silver.censureOfPursuit: The attack deals extra radiant damage equal to your Dexterity modifier.

Spark of Hatred.name: Spark of Hatred
Spark of Hatred.flavor: There is a spark of hatred in every foul creature, and in many fair ones. The power of your oath fans that spark, quick and lethal.
Spark of Hatred.target: One enemy that is not your oath of enmity target
Spark of Hatred.onHit: The target is dominated until the start of your next turn. Until this domination ends, the target can attack only your oath of enmity target.

Cataclysmic Duel.name: Cataclysmic Duel
Cataclysmic Duel.flavor: Mighty shock waves resound around you and your enemy. Each exchange of blows sends roiling tendrils of destruction across the battlefield.
Cataclysmic Duel.onHit: 7[W] + Wisdom modifier thunder damage, and the target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls against you (save ends).
Cataclysmic Duel.effect: Until the end of the encounter, whenever the target hits you, it chooses one of your allies within 5 squares of you or within 5 squares of the target. That ally is knocked prone. In addition, whenever you hit the target, you choose an enemy other than the target within 5 squares of you or within 5 squares of the target. That enemy is dazed (save ends).

Divide and Condemn.name: Divide and Condemn
Divide and Condemn.flavor: You stride instantly to your enemy and set your hand upon it, speaking a prayer of condemnation. Nearby enemies are scattered by your power
Divide and Condemn.effect: You teleport each enemy adjacent to the target 10 squares.

Eye of the Hurricane.name: Eye of the Hurricane
Eye of the Hurricane.flavor: You inhale and draw your enemies close, using their energy to deliver a thunderous attack against the object of your malice.
Eye of the Hurricane.onHit: You pull the primary target 3 squares, and it is deafened (save ends).
Eye of the Hurricane.effect: Make a melee secondary attack using your weapon.
Eye of the Hurricane.secondaryOnHit: 6[W] + Wisdom modifier damage, plus 5 thunder damage for each enemy adjacent to you.

Impaling Summons.name: Impaling Summons
Impaling Summons.flavor: Channeling the fury of the gods, you compel an enemy to fling itself onto your weapon.
Impaling Summons.effect: You pull the target to a square adjacent to you, then make the following melee attack against it.

March of Doom.name: March of Doom
March of Doom.flavor: You command your foe to march to the place where you intend for it to die, and then send your allies to slay it there.
March of Doom.effect: You slide the target 5 squares and teleport to a square adjacent to it. You then slide each ally in the burst 5 squares to a square adjacent to the target. Then you make the following melee attack against it.
March of Doom.onHit: 5[W] + Wisdom modifier damage, and you knock the target prone.

Merciless Nemesis.name: Merciless Nemesis
Merciless Nemesis.flavor: As you attack, you appoint yourself the nemesis of your chosen foe. Where you go, it must follow.
Merciless Nemesis.effect: Until the end of the encounter, whenever you hit your oath of enmity target with an avenger attack power, you can teleport 5 squares and then teleport your oath of enmity target to a square adjacent to you.

Focused Fury.name: Focused Fury
Focused Fury.flavor: As you smite your chosen prey, you drive back another enemy.
Focused Fury.onHit:
1[W] + Wisdom modifier damage. If the target is your oath of enmity target, you can push a different enemy that is adjacent to you 2 squares.
Level 21: 2[W] + Wisdom modifier damage.

Compelling Blade.name: Compelling Blade
Compelling Blade.flavor: Your weapon weaves a subtle trap, locking your enemy’s steps to yours.
Compelling Blade.onHit: 1[W] + Wisdom modifier damage. Until the end of your next turn, the first time an enemy enters a square adjacent to you on its turn, you can shift 1 square as a free action and then slide the target 1 square into the space you left.
Compelling Blade.censureOfRetribution: The distance of the shift and the slide equals your Intelligence modifier, but after the slide, you must be adjacent to the target.

Relentless Attack.name: Relentless Attack
Relentless Attack.flavor: Your attacks drive the enemy away, and no matter where it goes, you are not far behind.
Relentless Attack.onHit: 2[W] + Wisdom modifier damage. You push the target 2 squares and then shift 3 squares to a square adjacent to it.

Bound by Fate.name: Bound by Fate
Bound by Fate.flavor: You strike your foe and then share your pain with it.
Bound by Fate.onHit: 2[W] + Wisdom modifier damage. Until the end of your next turn, the target is immobilized, and the first time an enemy other than the target hits and damages you while you are adjacent to the target, you take half of the damage and the target takes the other half.

Fortifying Chant.name: Fortifying Chant
Fortifying Chant.flavor: You recite holy verses, armoring yourself with the strength of your faith.
Fortifying Chant.effect: Until the stance ends, you gain a +1 bonus to AC and Fortitude. In addition, whenever you reduce your oath of enmity target to 0 hit points, this bonus increases to +4 until the end of your next turn.

Chains of Censure.name: Chains of Censure
Chains of Censure.flavor: As you deliver a punishing blow with your weapon, your prayer invokes spectral chains to immobilize a foe.
Chains of Censure.onHit: 2[W] + Wisdom modifier damage. You choose to immobilize either the target or an enemy within 5 squares of it until the end of your next turn.
Chains of Censure.censureOfPursuit: If no other creatures are adjacent to you or to the target, the attack deals extra damage equal to your Dexterity modifier.

Wages of Sin.name: Wages of Sin
Wages of Sin.flavor: Your prayer channels the anger, the fear, and the wickedness of your enemy’s comrades to harm it.
Wages of Sin.onHit: 2d10 + Wisdom modifier psychic damage. The attack deals 3 extra psychic damage for each enemy adjacent to the target.

Vengeful Apparition.name: Vengeful Apparition
Vengeful Apparition.flavor: The touch of your weapon sends your foe reeling in terror, and you become ghostly, able to walk through walls and soar through the air.
Vengeful Apparition.onHit: 3[W] + Wisdom modifier damage, and you push the target a number of squares equal to your Wisdom modifier and knock it prone.
Vengeful Apparition.effect: You gain phasing and a fly speed of 6 until the end of your next turn.
Vengeful Apparition.censureOfPursuit: The fly speed equals 6 + your Dexterity modifier.

Rictus Grin.name: Rictus Grin
Rictus Grin.flavor: Your features twist in a deathly grimace, striking terror in those around you.
Rictus Grin.onHit: 2[W] + Wisdom modifier damage. Until the end of your next turn, any enemy adjacent to you takes a −2 penalty to attack rolls.

Rotting Wound.name: Rotting Wound
Rotting Wound.flavor: Putrescence weeps from the wound you bestow, rotting your enemy from the inside out.
Rotting Wound.effect: Until the end of the encounter, if the target makes an attack on its turn, it takes a –2 penalty to saving throws at the end of that turn.

Decaying Presence.name: Decaying Presence
Decaying Presence.flavor: Your presence decays your enemy’s defenses, allowing your prayers to strike without interference.
Decaying Presence.effect: Choose one resistance to a damage type possessed by your oath of enmity target. Until you reduce your oath of enmity target to 0 hit points, any enemy adjacent to you does not benefit from any resistance to this damage type.

Chains of Letherna.name: Chains of Letherna
Chains of Letherna.flavor: You invoke your god’s power to bind your enemy in icy chains until you can visit the divine vengeance its presence demands.
Chains of Letherna.onHit: 1d10 + Wisdom cold damage, and the target is immobilized until the end of your next turn. Until the end of your next turn, any enemy that ends its turn in a space adjacent to the target takes cold damage equal to your Wisdom modifier.

Leprous Wound.name: Leprous Wound
Leprous Wound.flavor: Your dire strike causes your enemy to fall to pieces.
Leprous Wound.onHit: 2[W] + Wisdom modifier necrotic damage. Whenever the target takes damage from an attack, it takes 10 extra necrotic damage and is slowed until the end of your next turn (save ends).
