Leprous Wound.onMiss: Half damage, and the target takes 10 necrotic damage the next time an attack hits it before the start of your next turn.

Raven Wings.name: Raven Wings
Raven Wings.flavor: Death’s shroud falls upon you, but your god intercedes and spares you from the approaching doom.
Raven Wings.trigger: An attack drops you to 0 hit points or fewer
Raven Wings.effect: You teleport 5 squares and can spend a healing surge.

Seeking Brand.name: Seeking Brand
Seeking Brand.flavor: You refuse to let your enemies escape you, scorching a brand upon your sworn foe that is drawn to the power of your oath.
Seeking Brand.effect: If the target is your oath of enmity target, you can roll twice on this attack and use either result.
Seeking Brand.onHit: 2d8 + Wisdom modifier radiant damage, and the target is slowed until the end of your next turn.

Avenging Shackles.name: Avenging Shackles
Avenging Shackles.flavor: Your prayers call for your enemy to stumble before you, and your enemy is bathed in radiant light that sears like fire.
Avenging Shackles.onHit:
1d8 + Wisdom modifier radiant damage. If the target is your oath of enmity target, the target is also slowed until the end of your next turn.
Level 21: 2d8 + Wisdom modifier damage.
Avenging Shackles.special: You can use this power as a ranged basic attack.

Steelsworn Oath.name: Steelsworn Oath
Steelsworn Oath.flavor: As you swing your weapon at your enemy, you infuse the attack with the power of divine retribution, and the power lingers on your foe.
Steelsworn Oath.effect: Before the attack, the target becomes the target of your oath of enmity, replacing your current oath of enmity target if you have one.

Relentless Stride.name: Relentless Stride
Relentless Stride.flavor: You perform miracles and walk through the air to ensure that your enemy does not escape your vengeance.
Relentless Stride.trigger: Your oath of enmity target ends its turn within 5 squares of you but is not adjacent to you
Relentless Stride.censureOfPursuit: The triggering enemy must be within 10 squares of you instead of 5.
Relentless Stride.effect: Before the attack, you teleport to a square adjacent to the target.

Glaring Admonition.name: Glaring Admonition
Glaring Admonition.flavor: Your oath binds itself to your foe, serving as a reproach that calls out for divine retribution.
Glaring Admonition.onHit: 3d8 + Wisdom modifier radiant damage, and the target takes a –2 penalty to all defenses against divine attack powers (save ends).
Glaring Admonition.onMiss: Half damage and the target takes a –2 penalty to all defenses against divine attack powers until the end of your next turn.
Glaring Admonition.effect: Until the end of the encounter, when you use an avenger implement attack power against the target of your oath of enmity, you can benefit from your oath of enmity as though you were making a melee attack and the target were adjacent to you.

No Respite.name: No Respite
No Respite.flavor: You force away the chaff that is your enemy’s allies with divine energy, leaving no one to interfere with your pursuit of vengeance.
No Respite.effect: Before making this attack, you push each enemy adjacent to you other than your oath of enmity target 3 squares, but not into a square that causes the creature to make a saving throw or take damage or another negative effect.

Blade of Repulsion.name: Blade of Repulsion
Blade of Repulsion.flavor: You guarantee that none who approach you can get in the way of your sworn oath.
Blade of Repulsion.effect: Until the end of the encounter, when any enemy that is not your oath of enmity target ends its turn adjacent to you, you can push that enemy 3 squares as a free action. In addition, if the target of your oath of enmity ends its turn adjacent to you, it is slowed until the end of its next turn.

Lifedrinking Covenant.name: Lifedrinking Covenant
Lifedrinking Covenant.flavor: You bind your enemy’s spirit in a pact with the forces of death, promising to send it to the afterlife one way or another.
Lifedrinking Covenant.effect: If the target is your oath of enmity target, you can roll twice on this attack and use either result.
Lifedrinking Covenant.onHit: 3d8 + Wisdom modifier necrotic damage, and until the end of your next turn the target takes 5 necrotic damage for each square it moves.

Oath of the Many.name: Oath of the Many
Oath of the Many.flavor: Your enmity knows no limits, and as you strike your foe you focus your vengeance upon it.
Oath of the Many.effect: Before the attack, the target becomes the target of your oath of enmity. If this causes you to have more than one oath of enmity target, you do not regain the use of your oath of enmity power until all your oath of enmity targets drop to 0 hit points, or until the end of the encounter.

Haunting Step.name: Haunting Step
Haunting Step.flavor: You let nothing stand in the way of reaching your enemies, especially when they threaten your allies.
Haunting Step.effect: Before making this attack, shift up to your speed +2.
Haunting Step.censureOfUnity: If your oath of enmity target is within 10 squares of you and adjacent to one of your allies, teleport into any unoccupied square adjacent to the target instead of shifting.

Radiant Beckoning.name: Radiant Beckoning
Radiant Beckoning.flavor: You draw upon the radiant energy of your deity, infusing your sworn oaths with power that sears your enemy and draws it into your attack.
Radiant Beckoning.onHit: 5d8 + Wisdom modifier radiant damage, and you pull the target 5 squares to a square adjacent to you.
Radiant Beckoning.onMiss: Half damage and you pull the target 2 squares.
Radiant Beckoning.effect: Until the end of the encounter, when you use an avenger implement attack power against your oath of enmity target, you can benefit from your oath of enmity as though you were making a melee attack and the target were adjacent to you.

Sacred Arena.name: Sacred Arena
Sacred Arena.flavor: You banish your enemies from your presence, keeping behind only the target of your sacred enmity.
Sacred Arena.effect: Before making this attack, you can teleport each enemy adjacent to you other than your oath of enmity target 5 squares to a square not adjacent to you, and not to a square that causes the creature to make a saving throw or take damage or another negative effect.

Wings of Pursuit.name: Wings of Pursuit
Wings of Pursuit.flavor: You manifest wings of pure divine power, which draw you ever closer to those you have sworn to defeat.
Wings of Pursuit.effect: Fly up to your speed to a square adjacent to your oath of enmity target, and your oath of enmity target grants you combat advantage until the end of your next turn.
Wings of Pursuit.requirement: The power Wings of Pursuit must be active in order to use this power. You must start your turn without your oath of enmity target adjacent to you.

Covenant of Repentance.name: Covenant of Repentance
Covenant of Repentance.flavor: You demand penitence from those who have flouted the will of your god, and you harm those who refuse to repent.
Covenant of Repentance.effect: If the target is your oath of enmity target, you can roll twice on this attack and use either result.
Covenant of Repentance.onHit: 3d8 + Wisdom modifier necrotic damage, and you knock the target prone. If the target is not prone at the end of its next turn, it takes 10 extra necrotic damage.

Brand on the Soul.name: Brand on the Soul
Brand on the Soul.flavor: You utter an oath sworn so deeply that the words of your prayer are seared into the very fabric of your enemy’s spirit.
Brand on the Soul.effect: Before the attack, the target becomes the target of your oath of enmity. . If this causes you to have more than one oath of enmity target, you do not regain the use of your oath of enmity power until all your oath of enmity targets drop to 0 hit points, or until the end of the encounter.

Raging Tempest.name: Raging Tempest
Raging Tempest.flavor: The storm’s fury sears an enemy with divine wrath and echoes with booming thunder if your allies follow your lead.
Raging Tempest.onHit: 1[W] + Wisdom modifier damage plus 1d6 lightning damage. The next time the target takes damage from an attack before the start of your next turn, it takes 1d6 extra thunder damage.
Raging Tempest.special: You can use this power in place of a melee basic attack when charging.

Storm Father's Favor.name: Storm Father's Favor
Storm Father's Favor.flavor: Lightning explodes from your weapon and thunder sounds all around. The combination indicates your god’s anger and means doom to your enemies.
Storm Father's Favor.effect: Until you do not make an attack against the target on your turn, any enemy other than the target that ends its turn adjacent to you or the target takes thunder damage equal to your Wisdom modifier.

Peal of Thunder.name: Peal of Thunder
Peal of Thunder.flavor: When an enemy interferes with your attack, you release divine fury in flashing lightning.
Peal of Thunder.trigger: An enemy other than your oath of enmity target hits you with an attack.
Peal of Thunder.onHit: 2d8 + Wisdom modifier lightning damage, and you push the target 3 squares. You also pull your oath of enmity target 3 squares.

Alacritous Assault (Heroic).name: Alacritous Assault (Heroic)
Alacritous Assault (Heroic).flavor: The fury of your god’s presence sweeps through your allies as well, causing them to gain better battlefield position.
Alacritous Assault (Heroic).effect: Each ally adjacent to you can shift 1 square as a free action.

Alacritous Assault (Paragon).name: Alacritous Assault (Paragon)
Alacritous Assault (Paragon).flavor: The fury of your god’s presence sweeps through your allies as well, causing them to gain better battlefield position.
Alacritous Assault (Paragon).effect: Each ally adjacent to you can shift 1 square as a free action.

Alacritous Assault (Epic).name: Alacritous Assault (Epic)
Alacritous Assault (Epic).flavor: The fury of your god’s presence sweeps through your allies as well, causing them to gain better battlefield position.
Alacritous Assault (Epic).effect: Each ally adjacent to you can shift 1 square as a free action.

Seal of Scales (Heroic).name: Seal of Scales (Heroic)
Seal of Scales (Heroic).flavor: Your god’s full fury not only smites your foe but also grants an ally additional protection.
Seal of Scales (Heroic).effect: One ally you can see gains a +2 power bonus to all defenses until the start of your next turn.

Seal of Scales (Paragon).name: Seal of Scales (Paragon)
Seal of Scales (Paragon).flavor: Your god’s full fury not only smites your foe but also grants an ally additional protection.
Seal of Scales (Paragon).effect: One ally you can see gains a +2 power bonus to all defenses until the start of your next turn.

Seal of Scales (Epic).name: Seal of Scales (Epic)
Seal of Scales (Epic).flavor: Your god’s full fury not only smites your foe but also grants an ally additional protection.
Seal of Scales (Epic).effect: One ally you can see gains a +2 power bonus to all defenses until the start of your next turn.

Strike of Perfect Beauty (Heroic).name: Strike of Perfect Beauty (Heroic)
Strike of Perfect Beauty (Heroic).flavor: As you attack your foe, divine energy flows from you to an ally, enabling him or her to also bring divine retribution upon an enemy.
Strike of Perfect Beauty (Heroic).onHit: 2d10 + Wisdom modifier radiant or force damage.
Strike of Perfect Beauty (Heroic).effect: One ally you can see deals extra force damage equal to your Dexterity or Intelligence modifier on his or her next melee attack against the target before the end of your next turn.

Strike of Perfect Beauty (Paragon).name: Strike of Perfect Beauty (Paragon)

Freedom Step.name: Freedom Step
Freedom Step.flavor: You blur into motion, moving faster than the eye can follow.
Freedom Step.effect: If you are slowed, immobilized, or restrained, the condition ends. You shift a number of squares equal to your speed.

Platinum Pride.name: Platinum Pride
Platinum Pride.flavor: When a treacherous foe would strike you, the Platinum Dragon’s shielding wing is there to protect you from harm.
Platinum Pride.effect: Until the stance ends, you gain a +2 power bonus to all defenses against attacks from enemies that aren’t your oath of enmity targets.

Symmetric Harmony.name: Symmetric Harmony
Symmetric Harmony.flavor: Your perfect strike invites Corellon’s blessing upon you.
Symmetric Harmony.trigger: You make a melee attack against your oath of enmity target and roll the same number on each die of the attack roll
Symmetric Harmony.effect: If the attack hits and deals damage, it deals 5 extra force or radiant damage. If the attack misses, you can teleport to any unoccupied square adjacent to the target.

Light of Civilization.name: Light of Civilization
Light of Civilization.flavor: A common enemy can restore a community’s bonds, and your successful attack helps an ally to share your purpose
Light of Civilization.trigger: You hit your oath of enmity target with a melee attack
Light of Civilization.effect: The target gains a +2 power bonus to its next attack roll against the target before the end of your next turn. If that attack hits, it deals an extra 5 radiant damage.

Prescient Knowledge.name: Prescient Knowledge
Prescient Knowledge.flavor: You perceive danger before it materializes and react accordingly.
Prescient Knowledge.trigger: An enemy that is not your oath of enmity target hits you with an attack
Prescient Knowledge.effect: You gain a +4 power bonus to all defenses against the triggering attack.

Implacable Mountain.name: Implacable Mountain
Implacable Mountain.flavor: Your faith in the Battle Lord gives you the strength you need to shrug off your enemy’s attacks.
Implacable Mountain.trigger: You are dazed, stunned, or weakened by an attack
Implacable Mountain.effect: Make a saving throw. If the saving throw succeeds, you end the triggering effect.

Wrath of the Sea.name: Wrath of the Sea
Wrath of the Sea.flavor: Your pain awakens nature’s fury within you, giving you the spirit to see the battle through to its conclusion.
Wrath of the Sea.trigger: You are bloodied by an attack
Wrath of the Sea.effect: Until the stance ends, your avenger encounter and daily attack powers deal extra damage equal to your Wisdom modifier.

Breath of Creation.name: Breath of Creation
Breath of Creation.flavor: Moradin breathes new life into you to help your injuries heal and make good on the oath you swore.
Breath of Creation.effect: You regain hit points equal to your healing surge value.

Pelor's Shining Light.name: Pelor's Shining Light
Pelor's Shining Light.flavor: None can hide from Pelor’s shining light.
Pelor's Shining Light.effect: The blast creates a zone of bright light that lasts until the end of the encounter. Creatures do not benefit from concealment or total concealment while within the zone.

Shroud of Winter.name: Shroud of Winter
Shroud of Winter.flavor: Your aspect changes to assume a skeletal appearance cloaked in shadow.
Shroud of Winter.effect: You gain concealment and become insubstantial until the end of your next turn.

Veil of the Moon.name: Veil of the Moon
Veil of the Moon.flavor: The air shimmers as if the sun set upon your shoulders. In a flash, you are gone.
Veil of the Moon.effect: You become invisible until the end of your next turn or until you hit or miss.

The Raven Queen's Decay (Epic).flavor: Your deity’s power finds a place within the body of your foe, causing it bone-deep pain.
The Raven Queen's Decay (Epic).onHit: 5d12 + Wisdom modifier damage, and you pull the target 4 squares to a square adjacent to you.
The Raven Queen's Decay (Epic).effect: Until the end of the encounter, your avenger encounter attack powers deal 9 extra necrotic damage against your oath of enmity target..

Sehanine's Misdirection (Heroic).name: Sehanine's Misdirection (Heroic)
Sehanine's Misdirection (Heroic).flavor: Sehanine provides you with the power to dance in and out of sight of your foe when you wound it.
Sehanine's Misdirection (Heroic).onHit: 2d12 + Wisdom modifier damage, and you pull the target 4 squares to a square adjacent to you.
Sehanine's Misdirection (Heroic).effect: Until the end of the encounter, whenever you hit your oath of enmity target with an avenger encounter attack power, you become invisible until the start of your next turn.

Sehanine's Misdirection (Paragon).name: Sehanine's Misdirection (Paragon)
Sehanine's Misdirection (Paragon).flavor: Sehanine provides you with the power to dance in and out of sight of your foe when you wound it.
Sehanine's Misdirection (Paragon).onHit: 4d12 + Wisdom modifier damage, and you pull the target 4 squares to a square adjacent to you.
Sehanine's Misdirection (Paragon).effect: Until the end of the encounter, whenever you hit your oath of enmity target with an avenger encounter attack power, you become invisible until the start of your next turn.

Sehanine's Misdirection (Epic).name: Sehanine's Misdirection (Epic)
Sehanine's Misdirection (Epic).flavor: Sehanine provides you with the power to dance in and out of sight of your foe when you wound it.
Sehanine's Misdirection (Epic).onHit: 5d12 + Wisdom modifier damage, and you pull the target 4 squares to a square adjacent to you.
Sehanine's Misdirection (Epic).effect: Until the end of the encounter, whenever you hit your oath of enmity target with an avenger encounter attack power, you become invisible until the start of your next turn.

Refire the Forge.name: Refire the Forge
Refire the Forge.flavor: The fires of the Soulforge flare to life inside you. The more your enemies try to quench them, the brighter those flames burn.
Refire the Forge.effect: Until the stance ends, you regain hit points equal to your Dexterity or Intelligence modifier each time you hit an enemy with an attack. Additionally, until the stance ends you can use the power Refire the Forge Attack, at will.
Refire the Forge.requirement: The power Refire the Forge must be active in order to use this power.
Refire the Forge.trigger: You are bloodied or reduced to 0 hit points by an enemy’s attack
Refire the Forge.onHit: 1[W] + Wisdom modifier damage and ongoing 5 damage (save ends).

Soulforge Hammering.name: Soulforge Hammering
Soulforge Hammering.flavor: Like Moradin working the Soulforge, you scorch your enemy with astral fire as you hammer at him relentlessly.
Soulforge Hammering.effect: Once per turn until the end of your next turn, you repeat this attack against the target of this power as a minor action. Additionally, until the end of your next turn, your melee attacks deal extra radiant and fire damage equal to your Dexterity modifier or Intelligence modifier.

Cloaked Steps.name: Cloaked Steps
Cloaked Steps.flavor: Shadows cling to you whenever you move, like a lover’s embrace.
Cloaked Steps.effect: Until the stance ends, if you move more than 2 squares on your turn, you gain concealment until the start of your next turn.

Dark Moon Strike.name: Dark Moon Strike
Dark Moon Strike.flavor: You mark a foe as your sworn enemy and you disappear from the minds of all other foes.
Dark Moon Strike.onHit: 2d8 + Wisdom modifier damage, and the target becomes the target of your oath of enmity, replacing the current target. You become invisible to all enemies other than the target until the end of your next turn.

Shadow Tricks.name: Shadow Tricks
Shadow Tricks.flavor: Your brilliant strike against your sworn enemy causes its allies to cast long shadows, creating openings in their defenses.
Shadow Tricks.effect: If the target is your oath of enmity target, each enemy within 5 squares of you other than the target grants combat advantage until the end of your next turn.

Holy Blessing.name: Holy Blessing
Holy Blessing.flavor: Kissing your holy symbol, you momentarily consider your next prey and how best to attack it.
Holy Blessing.trigger: Your oath of enmity target drops to 0 hit points
Holy Blessing.effect: You use oath of enmity on the target. Until the end of your next turn, the target grants combat advantage to you.

Prayer of Sacrifice.name: Prayer of Sacrifice
Prayer of Sacrifice.flavor: You are unwilling to fail your god and make a personal sacrifice to help ensure your success with the task at hand.
Prayer of Sacrifice.effect: You enter the sacrificial prayer stance. Until the stance ends, when you miss all targets with an encounter attack power, you can choose to take 10 damage that cannot be reduced or negated by any means. If you do so, you regain the use of the encounter attack power.
